content: **knitted hat in 2 strands drops melody the piece is worked bottom up with rib and stocking stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the midnight snug neck-warmer pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #midnightsnughat drops design pattern ml-139 yarn group d + d or f ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l l/xl fits head-size 54/56 56/58 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops melody from garnstudio belongs to yarn group d 100-100-100 g colour 28 navy blue **needles** drops circular needle size 7 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 6 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 7 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 11 stitches in width and 14 row in height with stocking stitch and 2 strands on needle size 7 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size ------------------------------------------------------- 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/261-45-midnight-snug-neck-warmer
